attributes.action: Stop Iraq air strikes (and do not bomb Syria, too)
attributes.additional_details:
See:

http://airwars.org/ 

for independent monitoring of international airstrikes over Syria and Iraq.
attributes.background: We the undersigned, recognise that hundreds or thousands of innocent civilians, including children, have already been killed in both Syria and Iraq as a result of coalition air bombings (see 'Airwars' report). Every life matters.
